message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13500.  This price reflects the value of the product, and I'm confident it will be a great investment for you.  Let's work together to make this happen.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than $13500. I'm thinking more along the lines of $11500. I'm confident that's a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it at that price.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $11500 is simply too low for me. Let's compromise at $12500. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider my other options.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $12500. I'm thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product at this price, and I believe it's a fair deal for both of us.
